content:
TASK: Craft an item of type: green_stained_glass
inventory=[{"type": "netherite_boots", "quantity": 1, "index": 20}, {"type": "glass", "quantity": 8, "index": 25}, {"type": "green_dye", "quantity": 1, "index": 32}, {"type": "jungle_door", "quantity": 11, "index": 36}, {"type": "gray_terracotta", "quantity": 42, "index": 41}, {"type": "porkchop", "quantity": 7, "index": 45}]
thought: To craft green stained glass I need to put 8 glass blocks in a square shape and place a green dye in the middle. First I will move a single glass block into slot 1.
Ok
act: move from slot 25 to slot 1 with quantity 1

TASK: Craft an item of type: green_stained_glass

thought: Next I will move another glass block into slot 2, which is adjacent to slot 1.
Ok
act: move from slot 25 to slot 2 with quantity 1
